Oops, it's actually equivalent to 26 chapters in manga format. The 27th chapter is not included in this one.

These 78 chapters in webtoon format (from Lezhin) are equivalent to 27 chapters (from DLsite) in manga format. What's weird is that the official English version on Lezhin is now missing, while the Japanese version only has 72 chapters and last updated in July.

But I guess the weirdest thing is that this woman wouldn't break up with her husband.
